pr_title: Export InstrumentationLibraryInfo to Zipkin and Jaeger

timeline.message: Export InstrumentationLibraryInfo to Zipkin and Jaeger

timeline.bodyText: It might be nice to have a test that verifies that we have 6 keys when the version is set, as well.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: but I won't hold up this PR for it, since we have higher-level tests with the details in them already
replies.author: jkwatson
